text: In light of the painful layoffs today, re-upping that we're looking for another writer on Vice News Tonight on HBO. We'd happily consider writers or editors for the job—only real requirement is great news sense and prose. DMs are open!
author: reidcherlin

text: Sorry for errant comma!
author: reidcherlin

text: Vice News Tonight is looking to hire another writer for our nightly show on @hbo. No link yet so just DM me if you or someone you know are/is a brilliant writer, who likes news, TV, and deadlines!
author: reidcherlin

text: Vividly remember how hard it was for the WH press office to deal with people who were writing books about Obama. They seemed to seep into the building like water. (Leading to a lot of @BenLaBolt fuming.) Can't imagine how impossible a task that would be in *this* operation.
